00058             function                set_add_limitations( $theAddLimitation )
00059             {
00060                   try
00061                   {
00062                         if( $this->AddLimitations === '1 = 1' )
00063                         {
00064                               $this->AddLimitations = $theAddLimitation;

00102             function                get_package_appliance( $PageName )
00103             {
00104                   try
00105                   {
00106                         $Security = & get_package( 'security' );
00107                         $PageName = $Security->get( $PageName , string );
00108                         
00109                         $PageName = htmlspecialchars( $PageName , ENT_QUOTES );
00110                         
00111                         if( file_exists( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/../page/data/pa_'.$PageName ) )
00112                         {
00113                               $RowPage = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( 
00114                                     dirname( __FILE__ ).'/../page/data/pa_'.$PageName
00115                               );
00116                               
00117                               $Appliance = array();
00118                               
00119                               foreach( $RowPage as $rp )
00120                               {
00121                                     $Appliance [] = array( 
00122                                           'package' => $rp[ 0 ] , 'package_version' => $rp[ 1 ] , 
00123                                           'options' => $rp[ 2 ] , 'placeholder' => $rp[ 3 ]
00124                                     );
00125                               }
00126                               
00127                               return( $Appliance );
00128                         }
00129                         else
00130                         {
00131                               return( array() );
00132                         }
00133                   }
00134                   catch( Exception $e )
00135                   {
00136                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00137                   }
00138             }
